tool_description: Verifies CVV/CVC codes against card type requirements and validates format compliance.

cvv_code.description: CVV/CVC security code from the card

card_type.description: Type of card (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid CVV format: CVV must be 3-4 digits depending on card type - Visa/MC use 3 digits, Amex uses 4.
CVV length mismatch: CVV length does not match requirements for the specified card type.
Non-numeric CVV: CVV code must contain only numeric characters.
usage: Provide the cvv_code and corresponding card_type. Set strict_validation to false for lenient checking. Returns verification result.

is_valid.description: Whether the CVV code is valid

expected_length.description: Expected CVV length for this card type
